name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized PowerShell Command Execution
description: This playbook mitigates an incident where an attacker executed a series of PowerShell commands to extract credentials and exfiltrate sensitive data.

action--c27e841c-3cc8-4f45-8dc7-f845282f.description: Terminate any running PowerShell processes that may be executing malicious scripts.

action--df86fe3b-2de9-404e-836c-b2624fa3.description: Block any network traffic from the affected host to prevent further exfiltration.
